reviews.review: An outstanding game play and an amazing horrific environment. The cat and mouse chase between the killer and survivor is something i've never had before. Truly a fun and perfect game.

Для сохранения нервов и денег рекомендую не покупать эту игру. Работает криво, читеры. тунельщики и кемперы не сделают игру весеелее и желание  удалить игру  будет посещать вас все чаще и чаще.  Через большуую Ж работающиие перки , Кривой подбор тиммейтов. и что меня особенно бесит, это то, что разрабам пофиг на все. блокировка ушлепков в игре не работает, они все равно будут в твоем лобби.  (ну это лично мое мнение)

I'm not very good at this game. but I have fun with it.

I still cant get past the tutorial and ive owned this game for a year. The player walks so slow and when running its more of a fast walk. For a victim trying to escape death the survivors move like snails and it infuriates me. If moving that slow makes sense to anyone they need a head check. I need a head check for buying this garbage. I should have got a refund when i was able but I let Dead by Garbage sit on my desktop until I felt like giving it another fair try. What kind of gamers find this game fun is the question
I definitely recommend DBD :D It's addictive.

just play killer makes it more fun

It's janky, unfair, not at all newbie friendly, has seriously wonky netcode, and bad matchmaking issues - but if you can deal with all of that, it's a blast! For the record, that wasn't a smarmy, sarcastic dig either: This game IS fun, it just takes a lot of getting used to and patience. The above issues aren't nearly as awful as many of the loudest voices proclaim, but they exist, and they need acknowledgement to put the experience in the right context. Watch some tutorials on youtube to un-learn the game's own tutorial, learn about what perks ACTUALLY do, and if you do that you're set to enjoy this 80s Slasher/Dress-Up Simulator!

Never in my life have I hated a game so much and yet been unable to just delete the damn thing off my computer. Plain and simple, It's unbalanced and the devs don't seem to understand that. Sure in a vacuum the game is fine. But it's pretty much become an exclusive club to those who have been playing for years, and even they aren't having fun.

There's alot of reasons to give to dislike this game, but I refuse to put more effort into this review then Behavior puts into the game. The tl:dr version is, the devs need to overhaul alot of the game to fix bugs, rankings, and general unfairness of the game but they won't. Watch this game from a distance but in it's current state, don't buy it.
Terrible Ranking system , alot of bugs and glitches , wouldnt recomend

DbD is basically fun, has a lot of potential and yet even after more than 700 hours it's only enough for a love-hate relationship! I disagree with the following points.
1.) Not only has the problem of cheating not been solved, Behavior is simply not interested. Countless YouTube videos show the problem and the so-called mild cheating is particularly bad. Here you never know for sure if someone cheated. I've since disabled crossplay and dodge every lobby that has a VAC ban on it. Pointing this out on the Steam forums will get banned if you show how easy it is to cheat.
2.) The MMR is also not balanced. I'd rather wait a few minutes longer in a pinch, but the game prefers speed.
3.) SWF is fun, but in my opinion killers should have the option to recognize whether there is an SWF and then leave the lobby again if necessary.
4.) The community is really very toxic. Killers and survivors aren't that different.
I keep checking back, but I'm mostly disappointed. It's a shame, because DbD really has enormous potential and if it goes well, it's a very good game!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DbD macht prinzipiell Spaß, hat enorm viel Potenzial und dennoch reicht es auch nach über 700 Stunden nur maximal zu einer Hassliebe! Ich hadere dabei mit folgenden Punkten.
1.) Das Problem des cheatens hat man nicht nur nicht in den Griff bekommen es interessiert Behaviour schlicht auch nicht. Zahllose Youtube Videos belegen die Problematik und besonders übel ist das sogenannte milde cheaten. Hier weiß man nie genau, ob gecheatet wurde. Mittlerweile habe ich Crossplay deaktiviert und dodge jede Lobby in der auch nur einer mit VAC Ban ist. Wer in Steam Foren darauf hinweist wird gebannt wenn man zeigt wie leicht es ist zu cheaten. 
2.) Das MMR ist auch nicht ausgewogen. Lieber warte ich zur Not ein paar Minuten länger, aber das Spiel zieht Geschwindigkeit vor.
3.) SWF macht Spaß, aber Killer sollten m.E. die Option haben zu erkennen, ob ein SWF vorliegt und dann die Lobby ggf. wieder verlassen können.
4.) Die Community ist wirklich sehr toxisch. Killer wie Überlebende geben sich da wenig.
Ich schaue zwar immer wieder mal rein werde aber überwiegend enttäuscht. Schade, weil DbD wirklich enormes Potenzial hat und wenn es gut läuft ist ein sehr gutes Game!

Absolutely a gem of a game.  Learning curve is steep at first but after you get going it really is a fun game to play, solo or with friends.  The ability to do custom matches has really helped when it comes time to learning new skills, and I still yelp when I see Mikey standing behind me, silently stalking me.  It's worth what you pay for it, for sure, and I am excited for all the new chapters coming out!

살인마 봉사활동 게임임. 기본적으로 4:1이라 살인마가 불리하고 피곤한 게임인데, 너블스 말고 뚜벅이 살인마는 진짜 스트레스만 받다가 게임 끝남 1명 눕히면 2~3발전기 기본으로 켜짐. 개발진 병신새끼들이 발전기 수리속도를 늘려야 되는데 패치가 죄다 북미섭 기준이라 발전기 수리속도 절대 안늘림 이 게임 할거면 너블스 말고는 쳐다보지도 마셈 다른 뚜벅초 똥캐릭은 진짜 봉사활동임

Gra była dobra i jest do momentu gdy nie spotkamy gracza z darmowego klienta. Teraz grają w to dzieci z epic games. Jaki mam z tym problem? O taki:
- Kampią przy haku zdarzyło mi się przez to przegrać i to nie raz
- Psują dobrą społeczność
- kiedy wygrają wyzywają cie od ezików i nie dodają cię na discorda kiedy im podajesz ( pewnie ze względów wiekowych )
- Wydaje im się że są jakimiś twórcami i wyzywają cię typowo 3-klasistowskimi tekstami
Moim zdaniem jedna z gorszych kolaboracji z epiciem

Рецепт жареных детей из подвала.
Нам нужно:
-2 или 3 ребенка
-Морковка (3шт), лук (2шт) ,красный сладкий перец и огурец свежий(по 2 шт)
-Приправа с дошика (красного ),базилик и лавровый лист(2 шт)

Приготовление
Первым мы отрубаем пальцы а потом по нарастающей (по каждому суставу и так до головы ),глаза горькие по этому выкидуем.По желанию вырезаем язык ,если хотите приготовьте отдельно.Когда мы все сделали,мы отрезаем таз и выкидуем в мусорку . Срезаем вдоль грудины и начинаем освежевать ,сердце и печень можем оставить для гарнира ,остальное в мусорку .После промываем и дальше отрезаем интересующие нам части . Теперь к готовке соуса ,после его приготовления в разных приправах по вашему желанию ,промазываем куски мяса ,кладём на сковороду и жарим (если хотите сварить то просто закиньте в кастрюлю )Примечание:Готовится столько ,сколько и говядина.
После приготовление мяса вылажуем на тарелочку и поливаем соусом .
